text: Download PDFDonald J. Trump Media Advisory — Saturday, July 11th, 2015Who: Donald J. Trump What: Mr. Trump will give a speech on illegal immigration and numerous other topics. When: Saturday, July 11th, 2015 at 2:00pm. Press should arrive no later than 1:00pm. Where: Phoenix Convention Center, North Ballroom, 100 north 3rd street Phoenix, AZ 85004Press Contact: Please contact Hope Hicks with any questions relating to Mr. Trump's availability. [email protected]
title: Press Release - Arizona Event - July 11, 2015 - Location Update
